title: AJ Drexel Autism Institute - The AJ Drexel Autism Institute is proud to partner with The Academy of Natural Sciences for a sensory-friendly Covid-19 vaccination clinic on Saturday, August 13th from 9 - 11am. Sunray Pharmacy and medical staff will be administering first, second, and booster doses to anyone age 6 months and up. Though walk-ins are welcome, registration for all participating family members is encouraged. You can register here: http://ow.ly/3n4z50JTQZh The vaccine clinic will provide participating families with a visual schedule and social stories, as well as quiet rooms for those who need them. To the extent that it is possible, the environment will be sensory-friendly, and our expert staff and our volunteers have been trained to assist children with sensory issues. Families should access the vaccine clinic through the 19th Street entrance of the Academy. Each child receiving the vaccine and one parent will get free entry to the museum, which will open for visitors at 9AM. Parkit Express provides a discounted rate for museum visitors at the Logan Square Garage at 1815 Cherry Street. Download the iParkit app from the App Store or Google Play and create an account using program code ACADNMP001 to receive the discount. | Facebook
